categories: Category:Imperial Navy officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Soleric was a Commodore in the Imperial Navy during the Galactic Civil War. He was in command the 16th Escort Force that was tasked with the protection of commercial starships traveling between the Induparan Crown Worlds in the Ado sector.
When the Alliance started to employ privateer to ambush Imperial starships Commodore Soleric struggled to maintain control.
